plot: Sisters Jang-hwa and Hong-ryeon are murdered by their step-brother under orders from his mother so the two of them can inherit the property belonging to the girl's father. But the sister's come back as ghosts seeking justice
title: Janghwa Hongryeonjeon
plot_es: Sisters Jang-hwa and Hong-ryeon are murdered by their step-brother under orders from his mother so the two of them can inherit the property belonging to the girl's father. But the sister's come back as ghosts seeking justice
plot_en: Sisters Jang-hwa and Hong-ryeon are murdered by their step-brother under orders from his mother so the two of them can inherit the property belonging to the girl's father. But the sister's come back as ghosts seeking justice
